trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索通过此类的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 集合保留的引用控制通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.DataGridView%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.target: 将给定的列添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>名为`DataGridViewColumnCollection1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire contents of the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 将该集合的全部内容复制到一个兼容的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />（从目标数组的指定索引处开始）。
